random.title: random box
random.desc:

get the drop you've been wanting!!

modal.title: Receive notifications from dropkitchen
modal.context: Get notifications for drops, events, and other services.

modal.title:
Your friends and you both win!
Invite your friends and get a gift from Dropkitchen.
modal.context:
When a friend who isn't already a DropKit member signs up, you'll receive a random piece of DropKit digital art.
Every time a friend signs up, you'll receive 300 P.
